entries.quest_location_d: 'The Lurid Aurora is a shroud of uncertainty. Is she a foe... or an ally? Our enemies hide within her embrace, waiting for us. Yet, when Lady Luck turns her head away from us, the Lurid Aurora sighs and her ethereal breath clouds the vision of our enemies. To me, she is a friend. And to her, we're all the same. --Car'das poet'
entries.quest_patrol_d: 'I must keep my wits about me. The Lurid Aurora Nebula is a fickle entity. Out here, I'm as bright as the sun with the Black Envy onboard. The Black Sun know that I am here. It's only a matter of time before they react.'
entries.quest_patrol_t: The Lure: Patrol the Lurid Aurora
entries.split_quest_alert: Laetin A'shera: <Pilot, be ready! My systems show hostile vessels in your area. One of them could be the Talonbane Cobra!>
entries.title: Talonbane Cobra: The Lure
entries.title_d: 'It is of Laetin's suspicious that if I travel to the Lurid Aurora Nebula, I'll be able to draw out the infamous Talonbane Cobra. The Black Sun... they can sense me even before I leave the Tansarii Point Station. In the vast blackness of Ord Mantell, I am a glimmering beacon. I'll be glad to get rid of the Black Envy virus as soon as this mission is over.'
